eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
F&=&E\,dt\wedge dx+B\,dx\wedge d\varphi\nonumber\\
&=&E\,dT\wedge\frac{e_0}{R}dR+\frac{Be_0}{R}dR\wedge\left(d\Phi-\omega dT\right)\nonumber\\
&=&\left(E+\omega B\right)\frac{e_0}{R}dT\wedge dR+B_0dR\wedge Rd\Phi.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal T}^{TT}&=&\frac{1}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\left[R^2\left(1+R_x^2\right)+R_\varphi^2+B^2\right]\nonumber\\
{\cal T}^{TX}&=&\frac{R^2R_xR_\varphi\omega}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\nonumber\\
{\cal T}^{T\Phi}&=&\frac{1}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\left[B\left(E+\omega B\right)+\omega R_\varphi^2\right]\nonumber\\
{\cal T}^{XX}&=&-\frac{1}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\left[R^2+R_\varphi^2\left(1-R^2\omega^2\right)\right]\nonumber\\
{\cal T}^{X\Phi}&=&\frac{R_xR_\varphi}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\nonumber\\
{\cal T}^{\Phi\Phi}&=&\frac{1}{g_sl_s(2\pi l_s)^2\Delta}\left[\left(E+\omega B\right)^2-1-R_x^2+\omega^2R_\varphi^2\right].
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\left.\partial_\sigma T+\partial_\tau X\left(E+\omega B\right)\right|_{\sigma=0,\pi}=0\nonumber\\
&&\left.\partial_\sigma X+\partial_\tau T\left(E+\omega B\right)-\partial_\tau\Phi B\right|_{\sigma=0,\pi}=0\nonumber\\
&&\left.\partial_\sigma \Phi\, R^2+\partial_\tau X\, B\right|_{\sigma=0,\pi}=0.
\
